paragraphs.content: The Manager Hiranandani Financial Services Private Limited 514, Dalamal Towers, 211, FPJ Marg, Nariman Point, Mumbai-400021
Dear Sir, With reference to my/our application for Loan, I/We hereby request Hiranandani Financial Services Private Limited "HFS" to process the below mentioned request as per details provided.
I/We hereby authorize HFS to deduct the amount as mentioned below by adjusting from disbursement Amount:
I/We also authorize the HFS to deduct Pre-EMI interest from the disbursement (interest from the date of disbursement to EMI due date).
I/We hereby request HFS to disburse the amount in the following manner against the facility sanctioned, post deduction of relevant Charges, Fees, Insurance Premium and Pre-EMI Interest as applicable.
1. I/We agree that the credit will be effected based solely on the beneficiary account number information provided by me/us.
2. I/We authorize HFS to carry out the fund transfer as per details above.

3. I/We hereby agree that aforesaid details including account number are correct and further acknowledge that HFS accepts no liability for any consequences arising out of erroneous details provided by me/us.
